abstract: Antonio Ledezma, jailed mayor of Caracas, Venezuela, has been transferred from prison to private hospital for hernia operation; faces charges of conspiring against Pres Nicolas Maduro's government, and has been held in military prison pending trial.
lead_paragraph: It was unclear whether Mayor Antonio Ledezma of Caracas, who has been jailed on conspiracy charges, would be returned to prison after he recuperated from a hernia operation.

headline.main: Jailed Venezuelan Mayor Is Moved to Hospital for Surgery
headline.print_headline: Jailed Mayor in Venezuela Is Hospitalized

snippet: It was unclear whether Mayor Antonio Ledezma of Caracas, who has been jailed on conspiracy charges, would be returned to prison after he recuperated from a hernia operation.
